course.subject: SBMT
course.name: Business Project
course.description: The course is offered in two consecutive terms, such as Fall to Winter, Winter to Spring, or Spring to Summer.  Students apply skills and knowledge learned from business courses to focus on specific projects in a business corporation setting.  Students will work on group projects sponsored by participating corporations and supervised by Faculty members.  Approval from the course coordinator is needed prior to enrolling in the course.  Graded PP, P or F. Students may repeat the course for credits if different topics are taken.
